snippet: Eleven teachers who were accused of changing scores on state standardized tests will lose their licenses to teach for two years, according to the Georgia Professional Standards Commission.
lead_paragraph: Eleven teachers who were accused of changing scores on state standardized tests will lose their licenses to teach for two years, according to the Georgia Professional Standards Commission.

headline.main: Georgia: Licenses Suspended in Cheating Scandal
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Licenses Suspended in Cheating Scandal
